mapper.select: select a.no, a.title, a.category_no as categoryNo from post a where a.category_no = (select min(b.no) from category b where b.blog_id = #{blogId} and exists (select 1 from post c where c.category_no = b.no))

select a.title, a.contents from post a where a.category_no = (select min(b.no) from category b where b.blog_id = #{blogId} and exists (select 1 from post c where c.category_no = b.no)) order by a.no asc limit 1

choose.when: select a.title, a.contents from post a where a.category_no = #{categoryNo} order by a.no asc limit 1
